name: MAMUSHI: Revenge Isn't Always A Choice
description:
MAMUSHI is the premiere work of horror by novelist Walden Hanes, author of the well-received 2020 science fiction novel SAPIENCE. This limited edition of ten thousand OBJKT non-fungible tokens is the only print version of MAMUSHI Hanes will release. 

To escape unrelenting hostility at home, an expat child chooses to explore the outside world, finding solace in the beautiful and mysterious environs of Nara, Japan. While wandering an ancient forest, the boy stumbles upon a fearsome being as old as time. Emboldened by the encounter, he returns home to confront the true evils of his existence.

Content Warning: For mature readers eighteen years and older. This story contains elements of psychopathy, body horror, and graphic supernatural violence. Certain scenes involve incidents of domestic violence and child abuse. Survivors of abuse are advised to approach this story with caution.
